item.description:
Happy hourers will hang once again at Coogan's in the Faneuil Hall area to imbibe social lubricants.

Get there when you can. I'll arrive at 5:30 and hang until about 9.

I'll buy the first new member who finds me, a drink.

Free Baileys, Kahlua, & Malibu treats for everyone.

Trivia contest begins at 7. Join the winning teams!

Enjoy complimentary appetizers paid from our winnings. Get there before they're gone.

Coogan's Web Page

If you come hungry here's Coogan's Menu.
Great burgers. steak tips, pizza and a $10 lobster special.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU


Trivia rules:

1) Up to six players on each team to be eligible for the first place prize. Be aware if a team with less than six players has one of the top three scores, that team would win first or second place.

2) Use the Stump! sheet, to keep your team score, which the trivia jockey (TJ) provides . Write the categories as the TJ reads them, and keep track of the points you've wagered.

3) When the TJ asks a question, you have one song to write your team name, your answer, and your wager on an answer ticket and hand it in. You can wager 1, 3, 5, or 7 points in the first two quarters, and 2, 4, 6, or 8 points in the last two quarters. You can only use each value ONCE per quarter.

4) There are three bonus rounds where you can earn lots of extra points! Your TJ will explain how they work.

5) No shouting out any answers, and absolutely no using cellphones/other devices to look up answers! Teams that break this rule may be disqualified.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be seated at the end of the bar furthest from the entrance and should be the only one wearing a Happy New Year tiara.
item.name: It's Thirsty Thursday, So It's Time For Coogan's Again
